description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up

description:
Leading free speech writers association PEN America has cancelled a major literary festival and awards ceremony amidst a boycott by the pro-Palestine far Left in a further sign of the death of irony.

The post Free Speech Writers Association Cancels Festival and Awards Ceremony Amidst Far Left Boycott appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Free Speech Writers Association Cancels Festival and Awards Ceremony Amidst Far Left Boycott

description:
The NHS is to declare that sex is a matter of biology in a landmark shift against gender ideology as ministers prepare to ban trans 'women' (i.e., men) from women-only wards.

The post NHS Declares Sex to Be Biological Fact in Landmark Shift Against Gender Ideology appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: NHS Declares Sex to Be Biological Fact in Landmark Shift Against Gender Ideology

description:
Jerry Seinfeld has blamed the "extreme Left" and "PC c*nts" for killing comedy on television, claiming networks were too worried "about offending other people".

The post Seinfeld Blames “Extreme Left” for Killing TV Comedy appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Seinfeld Blames “Extreme Left” for Killing TV Comedy

description:
The U.K.'s Net Zero policy is unachievable, disastrous and pointless – and that's the case even if you accept that CO2 emissions are warming the atmosphere, says Robin Guenier as he sets out the case against Net Zero.

The post The Case Against Net Zero appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Case Against Net Zero

description:
The Australian state's tyrannical control over bodily autonomy during an 'emergency' was confirmed today by the Supreme Court as it dismissed a vaccine mandate challenge brought against the West Australian Police.

The post Tyranny in Australia as Cop’s Supreme Court Appeal of Vaccine Mandate Fails appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tyranny in Australia as Cop’s Supreme Court Appeal of Vaccine Mandate Fails

description:
Do public protests change anything? A new study examines 14 protest movements in the U.S. since 2017, and finds that only one had any discernible impact on public opinion.

The post Do Public Protests Change Anything? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Do Public Protests Change Anything?

description:
Forget the recently exposed 'illegal school' teaching 'crazy' ideas. The true child-indoctrination centres these days are being run by the state, with their trans, race and Net Zero obsessions, says Steven Tucker.

The post The True Child-Indoctrination Centres These Days Are Being Run by the State appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The True Child-Indoctrination Centres These Days Are Being Run by the State
